description: Determine whether problems are coded with the recommended SNOMED subset.
bestPractice: Each problem in the problem list should be coded with a SNOMED code from the HITSP Problem List valueset (OID 2.16.840.1.113883.3.88.12.3221.7.4).

grades.A: >90% of problems have an appropriate SNOMED code
grades.B: 75-90% of problems have an appropriate SNOMED code
grades.C: 50-75% of problems have an appropriate SNOMED code
grades.D: 30-50% of problems have an appropriate SNOMED code
grades.F: <30% of problems have an appropriate SNOMED code
